text: aur (ai rasool hamaare) gidagidaane vaale bandon ko (behasht kee) khushakhabaree de do ye vah hain ki jab (unake saamane) khuda ka naam liya jaata hai to unake dil saham jaate hain aur jab unapar koee museebat aa pade to sabr karate hain aur namaaz paabandee se ada karate hain aur jo kuchh hamane unhen de rakha hai usamen se (raahe khuda mein) kharch karate hain
